article.description: Utah Valley State 62, South Dakota St 41
article.headline: Utah Valley State 62, South Dakota St 41
article.linkText: Utah Valley State 62, South Dakota St 41
article.story: OREM, Utah (AP) -- David Heck scored 19 points to lead Utah Valley State to a 62-41 victory over South Dakota State Monday night. The Wolverines (11-11) seized control of the game with a 14-0 run in the middle part of the first half. The rest of the way, the Jackrabbits (5-15) never came closer than 15 points. Matt Peterson added nine points and four assists for Utah Valley. Andre Gilbert led South Dakota State with 11 points and six rebounds. The Wolverines led 8-4 five minutes into the game. UVSC guard Sylvester Allison sank a 3-pointer as the shot clock expired to get Utah Valley State started on a string of 14 consecutive points. A pull-up jumper by Allison capped the 14-0 run and put the Wolverines ahead 22-4, and they led 29-12 at halftime. Heck scored 12 of his 19 points in the second half. In a four-minute span, beginning with 12 minutes left, Heck scored nine points on two turnaround jumpers, a layup and a 3-pointer. The Wolverines' biggest lead was 53-25 with eight minutes left. UVSC shot 53.7 percent, The Jackrabbits turned the ball over 24 times.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
